column4: i cannot get connected to Yahoo/MSN/gtalk with Pidgin. someone please HELP
are you getting an error message? I'm connected to all three right now without trouble
it just say's " Failed to connect to server"
can you tell me the proxy settings that you are using?
I'm not using a proxy
have you tried to restart pidgin?
thanks ! i got connected to MSN !!! :D
for yahoo also you are using No Proxy ?
yes
i selected No Proxy for yahoo too, it said it was connecting but suddenly after 1 or 2 seconds the program automatically closed!
what port was yahoo using?
Pager Port: 5050 and File Transfer Port: 80
ok thats the same as mine
hmmm....whats the Encoding ?
same here! Yahoo Japan is unchecked, Page server: scs.msg.yahoo.com, Japan Page Server: cs.yahoo.co.jp
yep thats exactly what I've got - and you still can't connect
try changing the proxy back to either GNOME or environment

using GNOME it doesn't connect at all. using No Proxy/Environmental i've tried connecting  in Invisible mode, and it says "connecting" but within 2 seconds or so the program is automatically getting closed!
I'm out of ideas hopefully some with a better idea can chime in
thanks a lot, at least the msn is getting connected now! :)
